Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui

Class Tui

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.Tui
All Implemented Interfaces:
Ui
public class Tui extends Object implements Ui
Class that represents the Text User Interface of the game.
